name: react-native-local-notifications
description: A local push notification implementation for React Native, supporting iOS & Android.
author: thanhzusu@gmail.com

scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf yarn.lock && npm cache clean -force && yarn
scripts.pod-install: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && pod install --repo-update && cd ..
